page.title: 20EDUCATION.
page.content: In our area there were once 3 schools,Linton,Upton Bishop and Gorsley.Now only Gorsley Goffs is still in existance.The other schools were forced into closure by education cuts and dwindling numbers of children.So in affect it was the closure of those two schools that kept Gorsley Goffs Primary open. Gorsley Goffs was not just a school it was also a Chapel.It was built in 1821 with money left by Edward Goff who had died 8 years ealier.It was to be a school for the poor as all the other schools at the time were fee paying.In 1852 the building became just a school. 1981 saw the rebuilding of the school. The work was completed in 1982.In 162 years Gorsley Goffs school has come a long way,I think Mr.Goff would have quite a shock!
